word_mean: 接种：接种病原体造成某一疾病的传染
把病菌或传染物植入培养基
接种免疫血清、各种疫苗和其他抗原物质用于预防、治疗或实验目的

sentence.Network_en: A corps of doctors arrived to inoculate the recruits.
sentence.Network_cn: 一队医生来给新兵打防疫针.

sentence.Network_en: After the 1960 s, China began to inoculate BCG, pertussis, diphtheria, tetanus, measles and poliomyelitis vaccines.
sentence.Network_cn: 六十年代后, 中国开始在大、中城市接种卡介苗 、 百日咳 、 白喉 、 破伤风 、 麻疹、脊髓灰质炎的疫苗的工作.

sentence.Network_en: I was just meant to come out here and inoculate some wee babies.
sentence.Network_cn: 我是过来这边给小孩子们接种疫苗的.

list.abs: self infection 自体感染self inoculation 自体接种self mutilation 自伤
prophylactic disinfection 预防性消毒  prophylactic dose 预防量  prophylactic immunization 预防免疫接种  prophylactic inoculation 预防接种  prophylactic measures.
狻裂窟擂秉糊恍洛浞遏旆葩孤葭瞻难拧俾糇憎浏彘暝宕萌西譬迭慧单坷动物接种(Animal inoculation)是最早应用的病毒培养法,在病毒学研究中主要有三方面用途.
接种工具有接种环（inoculating loop）、接种针（inocula-ting needle）、接种钩（inoculating hook）、接种.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'graft a bud or shoot into a plant of a different type'): from Latin inoculat- 'engrafted', from the verb inoculare, from in- 'into' + oculus 'eye, bud'. The sense 'vaccinate' dates from the early 18th cent

entry.tran: 给…免疫接种;给…打预防针
entry.def: To inoculate a person or animal means to inject a weak form of a disease into their body as a way of protecting them against the disease.

example.ex: ...a program to inoculate every child in the state...
example.tran: 为该州所有儿童预防接种的计划

example.ex: His dogs were inoculated against rabies.
example.tran: 他的狗注射过狂犬疫苗。

means.word_mean: 1. introduce an idea or attitude into the mind of;

sentences.sentence: "My teachers inoculated me with their beliefs"

means.word_mean: 3. perform vaccinations or produce immunity in by inoculation;

sentences.sentence: "The nurse vaccinated the children in the school"

means.word_mean: 5. impregnate with the virus or germ of a disease in order to render immune

auth_sentence.content: Virtue cannot so inoculate our old stock but we shall relish of it.
auth_sentence.res_content: Virtue cannot so inoculate our old stock but we shall relish of it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Virtue cannot so inoculate our old stock but we shall relish of it.

auth_sentence.content: The best way to inoculate against this particular virus is by teaching critical thought, logic and the scientific method.
auth_sentence.res_content: The best way to inoculate against this particular virus is by teaching critical thought, logic and the scientific method.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The best way to inoculate against this particular virus is by teaching critical thought, logic and the scientific method.

auth_sentence.content: He would inoculate all of the newborns in the hospitals he was studying with the good Staphylocccus.
auth_sentence.res_content: He would inoculate all of the newborns in the hospitals he was studying with the good Staphylocccus.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He would inoculate all of the newborns in the hospitals he was studying with the good Staphylocccus.

sentences.en: A pedigree pup should have been inoculated against serious diseases before it’s sold.
sentences.cn: 纯种狗应该在出售前注射预防严重疾病的针。
